column4: I have a quick driver question, is there someone that could help me?
no need to ask to ask...just ask it
you need to be a bit more descriptive other than "it doesn't work"...error msgs, what you've done to try to get it to work, etc
just a tip...linux usually only gives you back msgs when something's wrong. if it drops to a newline like that it's *usually* a good thing
